heading: Marinerâ€™s Refuge Dungeon Guide
content: Mariner's Refuge fast dungeon with the Sorcerer's . Since the completion time is fast, you can reliable farm this for XP or Nightmare Dungeon Sigil XP. However, the layout requires some backtracking, and the monster families leave much to be desired. While every dungeon has a somewhat randomized layout, there are patterns to where objectives and bosses are located. This map will help you identify those layouts so you can complete dungeons faster and maximize your XP and loot per hour! Reviewed by
